title: Weird Folder with Chinese Characters After Thunderbird Update
content:
I have Nebula 128.2.0esr (64-bit) for Windows 10.

On the same day of my last Thunderbird update, a mysterious folder appeared in the root of my C-drive with Chinese (?) characters.

The Folder name is: u馐㕈ʶ

(See the screenshots below.)

Inside the folder appears two items:

A Subfolder called: IDB and a file called: .metadata-v2

Inside the IDB Folder, I see these things:

Folder: 3647222921wleabcEoxlt-eengsairo.files and these files: 3647222921wleabcEoxlt-eengsairo.sqlite 3647222921wleabcEoxlt-eengsairo.sqlite-shm 3647222921wleabcEoxlt-eengsairo.sqlite-wal

Inside this folder: 3647222921wleabcEoxlt-eengsairo.files I see:

a folder called: journals and a file named 21 and 22

Inside the journals folder is empty.

Does anyone have ANY idea what this Chinese Character folder is?

Googling it, I see that it could have something to do with Firefox, but I don't use Firefox much and this folder appeared on the same day my Thunderbird updated.

Trendmicro Housecall, Windows Defender, HP Wolf Security -- NONE of them flagged these as suspicious, but I just don't like this mysterious folder on my C-Drive and wonder where it came from and what function it serves.

Thank you!
creator: ThunderbirdAhead

title: Why does upgrade to TB 128.x require administrator credentials to proceed?
content:
We've got around 2000 AD-joined windows 10 boxes, with TB as the mail client, for years. Users are connected as domain users (ie, non-admins). Now IIRC, first TB version installed was 60. TB was updated throughout the years automaticall without a hitch, up to and including version 115.x.

With the advent of 128 we had started receiving calls from users stating that a message pops-up asking for credentials. Taking a closer look we discovered that each and every installation needed admin credentials to be able to do the upgrade to 128.

Is this a bug or normal behaviour? It is definitely a problem, especially for small organizations that do not know how to install manually an MSI of the latest version.
creator: carmik

title: How to disable automatic removal of carriage returns
content:
Hi Everyone,

I have Thunderbird installed on two computers. When I receive messages that are in plain text, on one computer they are being displayed in a modified format with whitespace and carriage returns removed. On the second computer the messages are not being reformatted.

What setting do I need to change so that plain text messages are not automatically reformatted?

The trouble is that these messages are written with the contents displayed out in a nice table format, and when they are reformatted it makes them very hard to read.

I have tried searching for the answer myself, but I haven't been able to find anything that directly relates to this question.

Thanks, Ian

title: Sono stati scaricati messaggi vecchi su thunderbird.
content:
Buongiorno, uso thunderbird con un indirizzo mail (aruba) e due indirizzi pec (uno aruba, l'altro namirial). Oggi tutte e tre le caselle risultavano piene di messaggi in arrivo e inviati molto vecchi che ho cancellato da tempo dai miei indirizzi (la mia casella mail "in arrivo" ha messaggi fino al 2024, ma su thunderbird vedo messaggi anche del 2019). Non ho aggiornato il programma prima di questo problema, né ho modificato impostazioni. Ribadisco che il problema si è manifestato su tutte e tre gl'indirizzi su thunderbird. Ringrazio anticipatamente per qualunque aiuto mi verrà fornito

Mattia

creator: hleaker

title: Přidání položky do nabídky "Nástroje" v Thunderbirdu
content:
Dobrý den, řeším následující problém - vytvořil jsem si několik šablon pro urychlení práce, jsou standardně uloženy ve složce "Šablony" pod názvem Odpověď 1, Odpověď 2 atd. Lze nějakým způsobem přidat tuto složku do nabídky "Nástroje" popř. "Vložit"?? Jde mi o to, že v praxi používám cca 4 druhy odpovědí a nyní to řeším tak, že nejprve si otevřu složku Šablony, vyberu patřičnou odpověď a její znění zkopíruji Ctrl+C. Pak se přepnu na došlou zprávu, kliknu na "Odpovědět" a do těla zprávy vložím (Ctrl+V) zkopírovaný text ze šablony. Je to prostě takové to "škrábání se levou rukou za pravým uchem". Má představa je, že v došlé zprávě kliknu na "Odpovědět", následně rozbalím Nástroje (nebo Vložit) → Šablony a vyberu např. Odpověď 1. Možná to řeší i nějaký doplněk, ovšem ty jsou vesměs v ENG a na tu já jsem celkem slabý, (mne učili akorát rusky, což je mi platné jak ......) - řešil jsem to překladačem ale je to zdlouhavé a stejně jsem nenašel co by mi přesně vyhovovalo. Pokud by mi někdo mohl pomoci, budu rád a děkuji předem.

Jirka
creator: razitka.marhory

title: Ghost folders with outlook server
content:
I have problems with my folder structure after renaming mail folders. I'm using TB115.15.0 on Ubuntu 22.04, my uni is using outlook as a mail service config'ed with OAuth2. In settings->server->advanced, I have ticked the "show only subscribed" and "server supports folders" options.

A week ago, I have renamed folders, e.g. 3-class-2023-24-this to 4-class-2023-24-last using TB. The structure/renaming shows up correctly when viewing with the outlook web client.

But the old folder 3-class with its content still shows up in grey/italics. In the 'subscibe' menu, I can unsubscribe and submit. But no change in the folder presentation, and when I re-open subscribe, I'm shown this old folder still with a tick as being subscribed to. Similarly for the renamed: It is show as subscribed to at top level, but none of its subfolders. Subscribing to them makes no change, i.e. no subfolders added in the folder structure, and a subsequent subscribe view shows no change in their subscription status, still opens without a tick.

I've seen a lot of posts about ghost folders, with the issue being server side. However asking MS to fix their outlook server protocols for TB seems futile. And our IT service does not officially support TB. This is an annual change-over, and I even tried the brute force delete/add the mail account, but TB has remembered the username ans still gives me the same defective structure in the subscribe window, but now only shows the Inbox. I see no means of making the other folders visible.

Any solutions? Thanks, Jens
creator: j.mueller3
